pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========Overview========Bindings for Mark Adler's `unlzw<https://mathematica.stackexchange.com/questions/60531/how-can-i-read-compressed-z-file-automatically-by-mathematica/60879#60879>`_library.* Free software: BSD 3-Clause LicenseInstallation============:: pip install unlzwDocumentation=============.. code-block:: python from unlzw import unlzw assert unlzw(b'\x1f\x9d\x90f\xde\xbc\x11\x13FN\xc0\x81\x05\x0f\x124(p\xa1\xc2\x82') == b'foobarfoobarfoobarfoobarfoobar'Changelog=========0.1.1 (2017-10-26)------------------* Removed junk from ``MANIFEST.in``.0.1.0 (2017-10-25)------------------* First release on PyPI.
